What is you sex? Male Female
Menstrual History We want to know you more! No one else will know this information except us. Have you had your period?
That\'s okay! You can still use AdolesCare to learn more about your body, be aware of teenage pregnancy, and how to prevent it. Do you still remember when your last period started? Do you still remember how many days your last period lasted? Do you know the number of weeks between your periods?
That\'s not a problem! AdolesCare is here to help you track it. For now, let\'s just say it was 2 weeks ago. You can change this later if you want.
How many days was it? Select number of days Do you know the number of weeks between your periods? Select number of weeks.
No problem! We\'ll track it together during your next period. For now, let\'s say your period lasts for 5 days. You can change this later if you want. That\'s okay! AdolesCare can help you. Periods usually come about 3 weeks apart, so let\'s use that for now. It will become more accurate as you track using the app!
